mapper.select: select `client_id` as clientId, `grant_types` as grantTypes, `ip_whitelist` as ipWhitelist, `scope` from oauth_client where client_id = #{clientId} and client_secret = #{clientSecret} and `status` = 1
mapper.update: update oauth_client set `status` = #{status}, update_user = #{userId}, update_time = now() where client_id = #{clientId}
